org.ietf.nea.pa.serialize.writer.bytebuffer

Class PaWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ietf.nea.pa.serialize.writer.bytebuffer.PaWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Combined<ImWriter<PaAttributeValue>>, ImWriter<ImMessage>, Writer<ImMessage,ByteBuffer>

    public class PaWriter
extends Object
implements ImWriter<ImMessage>, Combined<ImWriter<PaAttributeValue>>
    Writer to serialize an entire integrity measurement component message compliant to RFC 5792 from a Java object to a buffer of bytes. The writer is composed of several writers, that are used to serialize the different message elements (e.g. header, attributes, ...). Attribute value writers can be managed with the add and remove operations.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private ImWriter<PaAttributeHeader> aHeadWriter 
      private ImWriter<PaMessageHeader> mHeadWriter 
      private Map<Long,Map<Long,ImWriter<PaAttributeValue>>> valueWriters 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PaWriter(ImWriter<PaMessageHeader> mHeadWriter, ImWriter<PaAttributeHeader> aHeadWriter)
      Creates the writer with a message header writer and an attribute header writer to serialize RFC 5792 compliant headers.
      PaWriter(ImWriter<PaMessageHeader> mHeadWriter, ImWriter<PaAttributeHeader> aHeadWriter, Map<Long,Map<Long,ImWriter<PaAttributeValue>>> valueWriters)
      Creates the writer with a message header writer, an attribute header writer and a map of attribute value writers responsible for different attribute values identified by vendor ID and type ID to serialize RFC 5792 compliant message elements.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(Long vendorId, Long messageType, ImWriter<PaAttributeValue> writer)
      Adds an object to the combined type for the related message type with the given vendor ID and and type ID.
      void remove(Long vendorId, Long messageType)
      Removes the object from the combined type for the related message type with the given vendor ID and and type ID.
      void write(ImMessage message, ByteBuffer buffer)
      Writes the given message data to the given destination after serialization.
